name: Rime Machiche
title: Mountain Guide
bio: I am an experienced mountain guide with over 10 years of experience leading treks in the Atlas Mountains. I am passionate about sharing my love of the mountains with others and helping them discover the beauty of Morocco. I speak English, French, and Arabic fluently and have extensive knowledge of the local culture and history. I look forward to welcoming you to Morocco and showing you the best of the Atlas Mountains!

reviews.comment: Rime was a great mountain guide. He was very patient and helped me learn how to climb in no time. I would definitely recommend him to anyone looking for a mountain guide in Morocco!
